title: 82/477/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 July 1982 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Photo Research - Pritchard Photometer, model 1980 A-WB with Cassegrain Telescope, model CO-1250, Scotopic Response Filter, model SF-80 and Tristimulus Filter, model TF-80' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 July 1982
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Photo Research - Pritchard Photometer, model 1980 A-WB with Cassegrain Telescope, model CO-1250, Scotopic Response Filter, model SF-80 and Tristimulus Filter, model TF 80' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/477/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Photo Research - Pritchard Photometer, model 1980 A-WB with Cassegrain Telescope, model CO-1250, Scotopic Response Filter, model SF-80 and Tristimulus Filter, model TF 80', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 26 November 1981, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 July 1982.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 134, 31. 5. 1979, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
